name: The Revenge of Kaleidoscope
description:
Personally I don't think it's good to click the "Unwise" link. It takes you to a game.

Just click the Experience. 

Don't bother with the whole aspect of finding what turns the buttons purple (click the purple to turn them red and lock them in place). 

Stay in the kaleidoscope, don't leave, just look. 

music which I didn't make is by: 

http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Dlay/Far_Away_Place/feels_like_fuzz_in_my_head...
